solution_line_template: If seven more rabbits are added to the thirteen in the cage, the total number becomes {rabbits_added}+{initial_rabbits_in_cage} = <<{rabbits_added}+{initial_rabbits_in_cage}={total_rabbits_in_cage}>>{total_rabbits_in_cage}

Triple the number of rabbits in the cage is {multiplier_for_triple}*{total_rabbits_in_cage} = <<{multiplier_for_triple}*{total_rabbits_in_cage}={jasper_rabbits}>>{jasper_rabbits}, the same as the number of rabbits that Jasper saw at the park today.
